description: The Total of 5 hours of lectures enlightens the beginning and the Professional artist with a new technique of applying acrylic paint and also reveals secrets based on forty years of painting mistakes. It has eight sessions of useful information and examples of how each one is used in the painting process. Achieve an easier method of acrylic painting while gaining more satisfaction from your work, taking this course will create a pathway to innovative thinking. It will change your life, as a painter. You will gain enlightenment from the practices that I speak of and the examples that I explain, and anyone with a basic knowledge of color painting will benefit.
title: The Joy of Acrylic Painting with Frosty Rankin
